All Implemented Interfaces:
BatchOperation, QueryCreator, QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,BatchOperation>
public class DefaultBatchOperation
extends AbstractUpdateOperation<BatchOperation>
implements BatchOperation

Implementation of the BatchOperation. Creates Batch query for save, saveNew, delete, deleteById operations.

Author:
Alex Shvid
